explanations.machine learning: The paper mentions training a machine learning regression model to predict matching scores between investors and financial advisors.
explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper employs an unsupervised technique to regroup financial advisors into clusters based on similarities.
explanations.regression: A machine learning regression model is used to predict the matching score between investors and financial advisors.
explanations.clustering: The paper uses clustering to group financial advisors with high degrees of similarity, shrinking the search space for matching.
